title: Himi 556
lyrics:
7.7.7.7.
1.
Toki me’a ka fakaofo
‘A e hā’ele mai ke nofo
Si’i Taukapo ne foaki
‘I he ‘ofa ‘a e Tamai.
2.
Ko e ‘Eiki Ta’engata,
Ka ne fale he tangata;
‘Ikai hao ‘i he langi,
Nofo hotau ‘atamai.
3.
Ngāue ka fungani ē
‘Oku fai ‘e Laumālie!
‘Ene tafi pe ke ma’a
Hoto loto ni mousa’a.
4.
Fai ma’u ai pē ‘ene tau
Mo e kovi ‘ia au;
‘O ta’aki aka kona
‘I he ‘atamai vaoa.
5.
Fai ‘e Ia hotau hūfaki,
Tokoni’i ‘etau vaivai;
To’e ai ke fakahā
Me’a ‘e ‘ikai ala tal
a.
6.
Hū mai, ‘Eiki Laumālie
To’o ‘a e kovi fulipē:
Kehe ke ke lata mai,
Si’i mata’ikoloa ‘o langi.*
